name: Evil Spring: Student Holidays
description:
A group of students has arrived at the little house amid the forest to celebrate the spring vacation. However they didn’t have an idea of the nightmare they were about to face. Right about them lives a solitary farmer, who possesses the craft of witchery and wants to enforce all the plants to yield already in spring. However he did something wrong.Game features
  • A mockery of American horror movies of the eighties
  • The craft of weaponry and munitions
  • A ruthless enemy! You won’t get a workaround in the park! Get ready for the real hardcore!
  • A simplified mode for the girl-students
  • The omnipresent darkness unless you have a flashlight
  • Survival is hard, but possible



You must repair the car and get out of there to be rescued. You are doomed without a flashlight, however its batteries are running of charge, that’s why you must have plenty of them. Spare the bullets and shoot straight. Don’t escape the bullshit and the nasty job – you won’t avoid them. There must be something inside the boxes. Create the weapons and munitions. Reload the weapon in proper time.
Examine all the items inside the houses – you may find out something important.
